actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to exempt certain motor vehicle transportation by or for maritime carriers in terminal areas.

summary.text: Exempts from the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission transportation by motor vehicle by or for maritime carriers in terminal areas where such maritime carriers are engaged in foreign commerce.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain motor vehicle transportation by or for maritime carriers in terminal areas.
